item.title: About this Blog
item.description: What can you expect here As far as I feel like it, I will write an entry about topics I am working on. I will break down how I use technologies, how I use them and what mistakes I made, so that someone else doesn’t have to solve the same problems. What do I write about Basically, there should be something about the following topics: Python3 Ansible Microcontroller projects It is not excluded that I will also write about other topics that are on my mind.
